title: Hair Ornament, one of a pair
description: one of a pair of hair ornaments including emblems of the hunt or war (quiver, bow and arrows), a fan, and a gong (one of the \'eight precious objects\'); gold filigree.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles S. Pillsbury, Phillip Winston Pillsbury, Mary Stinson Pillsbury Lord, Katherine Stevens Pillsbury McKee and Helen Winston Pillsbury Becker in memory of Charles S. Pillsbury
